ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] RE: Bard epic
ygData.msgSnippet: I thought it was level 50?  I dunno - heard the epics are capped somehow. Maybe those are only certain npc s once you start the quests.  Which is kinda crazy
ygData.messageBody:
I thought it was level 50? I dunno - heard the epics are capped somehow.
Maybe those are only certain npc's once you start the quests. Which is
kinda crazy imho. If these things are "epic," why not have them be dream
items that folks complete over a long eq career? I just dont get making
high level players perma-camp boss mobs in green dungeons for stuff they
need to go where they are supposed to go (keys for example.) But them again,
it would be even worse if those dungeons actually had groups playing in
them. I mean how pissed would you be if your group fought for over an hour
to finally get to the church in Kaesora and see some level 54 there soloing
all the mobs while he waits for Xalgoz. "Damn, another crappy rogue poker.
Damn, he dropped that crappy blade."

Sylly

-----Original Message-----
From: Bill Mann [mailto:dabard@...]
Sent: Wednesday, November 22, 2000 8:24 AM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] RE: Bard epic


Grats :o)
On a side note: I was able to get the Quest Giver NPC to give me the quest
the other night :o) I was afraid that I wouldn't be able to get him to talk
to me until I was 45 or 46.


-=B=-
44th
The Rathe
